name: Is It Warm In Here?
description:
A short game about bad jokes.
Made in 72 hours for MiniJam 124: Warmth
The limitation is in the game its just not very obvious (each time you answer a joke you get a point although there not displayed)
Can you finish the joke in a way the audience likes!? Can you be the perfect comedian!?

3 SEPARATE ENDINGS TO FIND!
INFINITE REPLAYABILITY!!
HILARIOUS JOKES!!!
NEWSPAPERS!!!!
TERRIBLE JOKES!!!!
 
if that all sounds fun then play... Is It Warm In Here?
in all seriousness this game is very short but hopefully somewhat entertaining. Is It Warm In Here? Or is that just me? is a saying sometimes said when nervous. Hilariously enough this is the only relation to the game jam theme whatsoever.
IF THE WEB VERSION IS NOT WORKING TRY THE DOWNLOAD
